pages.text: Useless tools from start seems have some potential. Abstractium are very flexible material and can obtain useful properties with correct recipe

pages.title: Cutting axe
pages.text: Updated abstractium axe, that obtain abilities to cut whole tree in one cut, but loose ability to cut anything else. Only usable by turtle, and will consume some fuel on dig calls.$(p)Also, seems even if axe enchanted with Silk Touch it still usable for turtle

pages.title: Extracting pickaxe
pages.text: Updated abstractium pickaxe, that doesn't care about distances. Seems, it mining any ore, that can be found in current chunk. Only usable by turtle, and will consume some fuel on dig calls.$(p)Also, seems even if pickaxe enchanted with Silk Touch or Fortune it still usable for turtle

pages.title: Correcting axe
pages.text: Updated abstractium shovel, that seems pretty regular. You only notice, that sometimes block drop depends on current dimension. Only usable by turtle
